Text:
Funny how you call them idiots for making a mistake and then make a typo yourself.

Thanks for the upload, this series has gotten better now that Bendis has moved on.
lol that is funny! the difference is that i was typing a comment/correction for free, while they're paid to get it right -- to advertise and promote via the official marvel website!

DreamingFar, in case other people in your life have been to busy to mention it, you are a dickhead.
